On a long and stressful workday, to freeze time and take a much-needed break.
During a heated argument with a loved one, to pause the conversation and give both parties time to calm down and reflect on their words before resuming the discussion.
During a traffic jam, to pause time and allow everyone to safely exit their vehicles and stretch their legs before continuing their journey.

During a performance or presentation, to pause time and allow the performers to take a deep breath and collect their thoughts before continuing, or to give the audience a moment to absorb what they have just witnessed.
In a moment of crisis, such as a natural disaster or medical emergency, to pause time and allow first responders and emergency personnel to quickly and effectively respond to the situation.
